website_summaries.verdict: Perfect for an impromptu stretch and regular trips to the studio.
pros: We love the wheel's modern design, strength of build, and supple grip of the cork material
Ideal for those new to yoga who need to gain confidence in his or her poses
cons: While we love the softness of the cork, it can be uneven at times

customer_reviews.title: I enjoy it very much
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous purchase! I enjoy it very much. The inside of rhe ring is plastic but can pass for wood. There is a bit of foam between the inside of the ring and the cork layer. It gives a little cushioning and makes the ring more comfortable. I purchased it to deepened my backbends and have left the ring in my bathroom so that I have it handy for frequent stretches. If I can make a request: offer thicker versions for maximum comfort. It does dig into my back if I use it for a couple of minutes.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ventures

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome piece of equipment. I have a wide variety of foam rollers and self massage tools, that I use on a regular basis. The yoga wheel is unique, in that it incorporates a greater stretch, along with that "rolling" feeling. My job requires me to spend a great deal of time in a car and this has taken a toll on my hips (specifically tight hip flexors). I have been spending about 10 minutes a day on this thing, just before going to bed and I am benefitting greatly from it. The yoga wheel just might be the antidote to sitting all day at work. Thank you for a solid and effective product.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald McDermott

customer_reviews.title: Yeah, just buy it already.
customer_reviews.text: Y'all, this thing is kinda beautiful. If I saw this in an Ikea, I'd be all like, "Oh, that would look cool on my bookshelf." It's a much more gentle pressure than a foam roller. I was able to relax my back more easily and get some of those snaps, crackles, and pops out of my back on the very first use. I think I'll be using this quite often.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: It came with a nice yoga strap
customer_reviews.text: Really well made, solid construction. It came with a nice yoga strap, too. I have only done a few basic excercises, and my back cracked a hundred times. I had a sharp pain in my rhomboids, hopped on the wheel, and felt better instantly. I look forward to discovering more exercises. It would be nice if the wheel came with a sheet of suggested uses, but they did send me an email with some great links.
customer_reviews.author: H. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: It works great but don’t be fooled
customer_reviews.text: I do think this is a good wheel for beginners as smaller wheels cause too much pressure. Although the cork is merely a thin laminate on foam for esthetics, it does provide sufficient cushion for me at 165 lbs. I don’t think it could be any wider before it would dig into your shoulder blades when rolling. I’m giving it 4/5 stars because I think the advert is a little misleading in reference to the cork. Also, I thought I would like the wood grain but in person it looks very fake. It reminds me of cheap furniture I had as a kid. At the end of the day, I do enjoy this roller and I believe it is durable.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn N.

customer_reviews.title: Relives Pain from Desk Hunching, Better Yoga Backbends
customer_reviews.text: I practice yoga 3x times a week & just using this for a few minutes each day has really helped me with my backbends. As someone who spends most of the day hunched over a desk on my computer, this thing has been a total game changer. It instantly relives my back pain. I let my roommate try it & she instantly went & bought one herself. The cork/wood design easily blends in with my decor. Love this little wheel!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: It is slightly smaller than I expected, but I’m pretty happy with it! It definitely helps me get further into back bends and also stabilizes and feels sturdy. As you can see from my photo, I’m a fan of cork yoga products. I would absolutely recommend this item. Just realize that it’s more along the lines of a medium than a large ring. Namaste!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan & Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional.
customer_reviews.text: I am a yoga instructor and use props regularly to build strength in my practice. I have never used a yoga wheel before but like this one so far. Also it matches my manduka cork blocks lol. It is beautiful and functional. My boyfriend who does not do yoga has been stealing it to stretch and work out. We love this wheel! On a side note, the company has been very attentive by following up and sending links to uses and such. So far a pleasure.
customer_reviews.author: torrey dunn

customer_reviews.title: Great yoga assistant!
customer_reviews.text: I am just get started with my practice again so I have to move slowly, but using this wheel a little bit each day, will help me restore my mobility and backbends. It feels a bit rigid right now, like it pulls against my skin as i lay on it, but my muscles are resisting a lot as i practice in a lot of ways, so I will have to update this after some time has passed. As of now I think this will be a great tool to help rehabilitate my spin back into alignments and health.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany P. Zaken

customer_reviews.title: Lovely, amazing confortable yoga wheel, perfect to increase spine flexibility
customer_reviews.text: Such an amazing product, perfect to stretch out your back. Go slowly and over time it will feel more comfortable opening up your spine and back while increasing your flexibility and range. I love the design with the soft cork. Thank you for sharing such an amazing item with the world. It opens up your chest and back to more love and life!
customer_reviews.author: Answers

customer_reviews.title: Great low cost option.
customer_reviews.text: I saw an add for a set of expensive wheels and then found this guy. It looks very nice and does the same job. I don't have existing back issues but this helps crack and stretch it.
customer_reviews.author: Ben B

customer_reviews.title: Great Yoga Wheel
customer_reviews.text: My whole family is in love with this yoga wheel! I am not an advanced yogi, but this wheel helps me get into and hold positions that were typically out of reach for me. My kids and husband love massaging their backs by rolling up and down the wheel. I am happy I purchased this and this wheel. The quality of the materials is high and it should last for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Looks good 12" Wheel
customer_reviews.text: So sad to get a defective wheel. There was chip and the foam didn't glue right. Otherwise it looks good. The wheel is still plastic glossy so it's just the print to make it looks like wood. I think 13" is not right, it's the same size as my friend's 12" wheel so I took a ruler and it is 12".
customer_reviews.author: Egg

customer_reviews.title: A solid product from a solid company
customer_reviews.text: Zach & Todd have created a solid product. Love the convenience of amazon prime as well as supporting a small company. I'm new to using a yoga wheel but they followed up with a helpful email containing instructions on how to get started using a wheel. It's the small touches that matter. I've used for a few days with back bends/heart openers, shoulder stretches, and balancing on the wheel on my feet. Feels extremely sturdy. The inside finish is stunning. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Russell

customer_reviews.title: The plastic looks very wood like in person
customer_reviews.text: The plastic looks very wood like in person. The seam where the cork meets itself is not glued perfect but overall it is a beautiful wheel and gripped well for me during balance poses on a wood floor.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: but the wood design on the plastic is SO beautiful, and my backbends have already improved so so ...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had it for a few days, but the wood design on the plastic is SO beautiful, and my backbends have already improved so so much! It’s basically the same as the other yoga wheels I’ve tried, but it blends into my house decorations easier than a neon one. Plus the company sends you a helpful little email with instructions & ideas.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: So sturdy and cracks my spine like a dream. I weight 26p lbs and I was nervous about the wheel handling my weight. But, it's amazing. It is my first wheel. It is so beautiful, the wood inside and cork grips great and had natural anti microbial properties. Also environmentally friendly. What's not to love? One thing I will say is I thought there would be some give. There is none. Which is why it works.
customer_reviews.author: Serina Faith

customer_reviews.title: No instructional video :(
customer_reviews.text: I did not receive the free instructional video which I was hoping to use as I had heard good things about it and frankly could use the help to get started! Otherwise it’s beautiful and comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Baker

customer_reviews.title: Solid Wheel
customer_reviews.text: A little narrow compared to most wheels, not too bad though. Solid structure, feel safe using it. Roll on hard floors, not carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Donald D Deibler

customer_reviews.title: Solid, works well
customer_reviews.text: stable, comfortable, I am really getting into backbends more comfortably with this. And being supported by the wheel means that my poor wrists are not so strained by the weight and pressure of trying to lift myself up.
customer_reviews.author: BeckT

customer_reviews.title: Poor finish on the product
customer_reviews.text: The yoga wheel seems to be sturdy and will do the job I’m looking for it to do “increase flexibility” and help with back pain. However, the wheel is 12.5 inches and not 13inches as indicated in the description. Not a problem. My biggest disappointment is the finish on the inside of the wheel. The varnish used did not dry properly...there are streaks on the inside. Also one side of the wheel has scuff marks. It won’t affect the performance...however it doesn’t look as good as other wheels I have seen from the same manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Angela R Craven

customer_reviews.title: Love this yoga wheel
customer_reviews.text: Love this yoga wheel! This is my first wheel to add to my practice and I LOVE it. It helps so much with extension and the padding is so thick you could never feel the wheel. It’s very sturdy and love the natural look!
customer_reviews.author: adam1317

customer_reviews.title: Excellent wheeling and dealing
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a friend but did some yoga on it to test it out. Very good quality. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie M.

customer_reviews.title: Fills a very specific, but important need
customer_reviews.text: The key differences between this and your typical foam roller is the narrow width and stiffness, allowing you to full open up your chest as you stretch all along your back.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Lee

customer_reviews.title: Best look & bang for your buckA
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive and fantastic! Other brands upcharge the crapola out of these. I spent an hour doing research and this is the best looking and beat bang for ya buck!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good item
customer_reviews.text: The item is pretty awesome for my lower back pain. It seemed to relieve some pain within a few minutes of me using it. The only thing is...it came with scratches so it seems used.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It actually relaxes me aside from giving me the best back stretch there is
customer_reviews.text: I use this every night before bedtime. It actually relaxes me aside from giving me the best back stretch there is. And yes, cracks I hear often. Definitely releases my back stress from behind the desk. Beautiful and we'll made.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian T.

customer_reviews.title: Not really cork...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thinking it would be the best affordable/eco-friendly option but I was really disappointed to see that the cork is just a thin layer over foam. The whole thing is made of plastic, which I'm trying to avoid. Unfortunately, the wooden wheels are over $100 so I settled for what I thought was the next best option. I'm giving it 4 stars because the product itself seems well made and looks as advertised (minus the misleading cork) - I think this will really advance my practice and help me to unlock these backbends!
customer_reviews.author: TmgKmg

customer_reviews.title: Good backstretch
customer_reviews.text: Great prop and looks great on the shelf. The video link isn't very informative but the are all of videos on utube
customer_reviews.author: Stacey gould

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for a bout a week now and wow I love it. I highly recommend you purchase this; your body will thank you for it.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: My favorite prop for doing yoga at home
customer_reviews.text: My favorite prop for doing yoga at home. Sturdily built and helps a lot in practicing head stand. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun and effective Yoga prop
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this Yoga wheel. It’s well made, visually appealing and durable. Great prop to help you work on back flexibility. Also great to use for a quick stretch.
customer_reviews.author: Erinda

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what my shoulders and back needed.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what my shoulders and back needed. It’s my first yoga wheel so I don’t have much to compare it to, but I’m in love. An investment I wish I’d of made long ago. Curious to see how the cork and foam hold up over time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Uneven size in the padding
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and great thick padding. Good price for a cork yoga wheel, unfortunately the area where the cork meets is uneven with a difference in size.
customer_reviews.author: Lina

customer_reviews.title: Love this wheel
customer_reviews.text: Love this wheel. My back and chest get tight from being on my computer a lot, so I bought this wheel to stretch throughout the day. I ended up getting a much better stretch than I anticipated. I work from home so I keep my yoga mat, and now wheel, nearby. It's great. Also, the cork is soft enough so my spine doesn't hurt while.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: I’m very pleased with the quality of this yoga wheel. It’s both sturdy and attractive.
customer_reviews.author: cc

customer_reviews.title: Solid stuff
customer_reviews.text: Solid product that helps me increase my flexibility and work on my bridges. Enjoying it so far!
customer_reviews.author: Frank A. Fedele III

customer_reviews.title: i love this wheel
customer_reviews.text: i love this wheel! very modern and goes well with the style of my practice. helps me a lot in my back bends
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for my back AND the whole family loves using ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic for my back AND the whole family loves using it. I have kyphosis and this has been Greg for trying to get some mobility back in my spine.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Lundy

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing and my back now feels wonderful as ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing and my back now feels wonderful as a result of using it regularly. Do it for 1 minute before a long drive and you'll be much happier.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Atkinson

customer_reviews.title: Freory Yoga Wheel
customer_reviews.text: I've only tried it out once, but i love it. it's also beautiful to look at. Also bought one for my yoga instructor daughter for Christmas .
customer_reviews.author: squeak

customer_reviews.title: Best wheel I've used
customer_reviews.text: Received it Wednesday and have been using it for restorative practice after classes! It works super well. The cork is firm enough to give pressure and soft enough that it's not uncomfortable. Amazing product. The only thing I would like to see is making a set with a larger one and smaller one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Such a good stretch!
customer_reviews.text: Got this today and used it to stretch my back after 13 hours on my feet at the hospital. I loved the stretch and relief I gained and can’t wait to use in more ways with different muscle groups. 1 complaint... there is a decent sized gap between where the cork pieces meet, I hope it doesn’t take away from function.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Increasing Flexibility
customer_reviews.text: Currently working on my flexibility and using this item for that and as an ‘advance’ foam roller for my back. Loving it!
customer_reviews.author: Harley Luvr

customer_reviews.title: Ordered as a gift for daughter-in-law who is a yoga instructor.
customer_reviews.text: She loved it. It was exactly what she wanted. She was very excited to receive it. Solid construction, very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: sAw

customer_reviews.title: ... a 6'1" 330 pound man (fatso) and this worked great for my poor back
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 6'1" 330 pound man (fatso) and this worked great for my poor back. I use it to do stretching a couple times a day.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Even Better than the Dharma Wheel & less expensive!
customer_reviews.text: I love this wheel!! I use an authentic Dharma Yoga wheel at the studio where I practice but wanted one for home practice. This one has a tad more cushion, which I really like and it is beautiful. Very sturdy - and grips well. On a silly note, I like that it is neutral colored so won't clash with my mat either.
customer_reviews.author: Solari's

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, well put together, and it looks just like the picture. The company responded really quickly when I asked a question, so the customer service is excellent. This is my first yoga wheel, I don't have anything to compare it to, but I am really pleased with my purchase so far.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor C. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the new addition to my yoga/self care collection. Constructed well and absolutely lovely. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JoeP.

customer_reviews.title: Very durable, and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great addition to my practice. And it’s aesthetically pleasing!
customer_reviews.author: Pedram Charepoo

customer_reviews.title: feels amazing!
customer_reviews.text: The ring is sturdy, the padding is soft, and it's taken my stretching and balancing to a new level!
customer_reviews.author: DemSK

customer_reviews.title: Strong and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Wheel is nicely made, strong and sturdy. The only thing was the seem on the cork wasn't very even and had a slight gap.
customer_reviews.author: Riki

customer_reviews.title: looks nice.
customer_reviews.text: My one-year-old son loves this wheel! I bought it for yoga, and it's a bonus toy for him. He loves pushing it all over the house. I can attest it also works for yoga, looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Maria P.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product and I'm thrilled with it
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product and I'm thrilled with it. Shipping however needs help. Both ends of the box were open when received and product couldn't have fallen out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love my Freory Wheel. ❤️
customer_reviews.text: Great Product. I recommend it for any Practice. It's comfortable and durable also light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Circles

customer_reviews.title: My back/shoulders/hips are LOVING this thing!!!
customer_reviews.text: Would have given it 5 stars if it was a bit wider...why doesn't anybody make an affordable wheel at 6-7" wide?
customer_reviews.author: notthatbrad

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived in a timely matter and is great quality. They even sent me an email with a booklet about how to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Love this, it is really well made and looks fantastic. It really helps with improving back bends and looking forward to deepen my practice.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. J. A. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Love the Freory yoga wheel
customer_reviews.text: Love the Freory yoga wheel! I would not trade it for anything! I would for sure recommend getting one for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would buy one for a friend
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with the product and would recommend it to others. The cork is very cushy so feels great when you're laying on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: BodyGood Cork Yoga Wheel. Pro Grade, 13-inch Dharma Yoga Prop Supports up to 500 lbs. Improve Back Bends, Deepen Practice or Release Tight Muscles
